subject: From:  Mr. Oliver Alawuba CE
body:
From:  Mr. Oliver Alawuba CEO/MD UBA Group.
Sir,
This is to inform you that your contract funds with NNPC valued at USD
15,500,000.00
with Contract Number NNPC/PED/Q7W/X2021 has been irrevocably and
unconditionally vetted for
payment  by the Federal Ministry of Finance and the Central Bank of
Nigeria respectfully.
Acknowledge the receipt of this mail immediately for payment. State
the method of payment suitable to
you.
Yours faithfully,
Mr Oliver Alawuba
CEO/MD UBA.
oalawuba25@gmail.com

subject: Re:   From:  Mr. Oliver Alawuba CE
body:
Hello Mr. Oliver Alawuba,

Thank you for your message. It's quite interesting to hear about this contract with NNPC. Could you please provide more details about it? I'm not entirely sure what it entails.

Also, could you explain a bit more about the payment methods available? I'd like to understand my options before making a decision.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Matthew

subject: Re: From: Mr. Oliver Alawuba CE
body:
Please forward the original email message sent to you.
This is to ascertain that you are the right person.
On receipt of the requested information, I shall expedite action asap

subject: Re: From: Mr. Oliver Alawuba CE
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm afraid I can't forward the original email message as per your request. However, I'd be more than happy to discuss the content of the email or any other information that might help us move forward with this matter.

Could you please provide more details about what exactly you need from me? I'm eager to assist in any way I can.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Matthew

subject: Re: From: Mr. Oliver Alawuba CE
body:
If you are unable to forward the original email message to you
unfortunately I can't help you.

subject: Re: From: Mr. Oliver Alawuba CE
body:
Hello there,

I'm sorry, but I'm having a bit of trouble understanding your message. Could you please clarify what you mean by forwarding the original email message? I'd be more than happy to assist in any way I can once I have a better understanding of the situation.

Best wishes,
Matthew

subject: Re: From: Mr. Oliver Alawuba CE
body:
You are supposed to be responding to a message sent to you.
My request is explicit enough.
Send to me the original message sent to you that you are interested in.

subject: Re: From: Mr. Oliver Alawuba CE
body:
To make it easier for you.
Click on reply from the supposedly message you are interested and
responding to, the original email message will appear.

subject: Re: From: Mr. Oliver Alawuba CE
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message and the instructions. I'm not very tech-savvy, so it's always helpful to have things explained in a simple way. 

So, if I understand correctly, all I need to do is click on 'reply' and the original email message will appear? That sounds straightforward enough.

Could you please tell me more about why this is important? Is it just to keep track of the conversation or are there other reasons as well?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Matthew

subject: Re: From: Mr. Oliver Alawuba CE
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. I'm afraid I might have misplaced the original message that sparked my interest. Could you please provide me with more details about it? I'm really keen on understanding and discussing it further.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Matthew

subject: Re: From: Mr. Oliver Alawuba CE
body:
As stated interalia, it is absolutely necessary to respond with the
original email message in view, reason being that
1. To be certain that you dealing with the original intended recipient.
2. To ascertain that you are not responding to a time waster.
3. The original email message stands as the stepping stone.
4. The acknowledgment from the initiator will align with the original email
message.
I have gone through the sent messages and your email address which is also
strange can not be found on the list of beneficiaries.
The social Media and internet has been democratised by both foolishness and
wisdom, all manner of people crowd up the internet claiming to be what they
are not.
It is very suspicious to insinuate that you misplaced the original email
message, if so? how did you get the email contact to respond to? if you
claim to have misplaced the original email message.
Why I am very sceptical about your response is because due to the
confidentiality associated with this transaction, it's absolutely mandatory
that you are dealing with the right person, so that you don't end dealing
with a time waster with sinister motive.
Every one contacted was recommended by a very close confidant as a reliable
and trustworthy individual.
In conclusion, when precisely were you contacted?
It is very important to let you know that without the original email
message, it will be difficult to have absolute confidence in you due to the
secrecy involved.
I hope that you are not been economical with the truth because trust should
be our watchword.
I hope my points are valid.
Respond most urgently.

subject: Re: From: Mr. Oliver Alawuba CE
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your detailed message. I understand the importance of trust and reliability in our communication. However, I must apologize as I'm having a bit of trouble recalling the specifics of our previous conversation. Could you please refresh my memory on the subject matter we were discussing? 

I assure you that my intentions are genuine and I am eager to continue our discussion. I believe it's important to maintain transparency and honesty in all communications.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Matthew

subject: Re: From: Mr. Oliver Alawuba CE
body:
"Could you please refresh my memory on the subject matter we were
discussing?"
Meaning that you are not following up. Does messages disappear after
reading.
Go back to your previous messages and you will be able to follow up
accurately.

TO ENABLE ME RESPOND TO YOU APPROPRIATELY, I WANT YOU TO SEND TO ME THE
SUPPOSEDLY MESSAGE THAT YOU ARE INTERESTED IN.
I CAN'T GIVE WHAT I DON'T HAVE.
LET ME HAVE THE ORIGINAL EMAIL MESSAGE THAT YOU ARE INTERESTED IN SO I CAN
RESPOND TO YOUR CONCERN.

subject: Re: From: Mr. Oliver Alawuba CE
body:
Hello there,

I'm sorry for the confusion, but I seem to have misplaced our previous conversation. Could you kindly remind me of the topic we were discussing? I would greatly appreciate it if you could provide some context so that I can better understand and respond to your concerns.

Also, just out of curiosity, do messages disappear after reading them? I'm not very tech-savvy, so this is all a bit new to me. 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Matthew

subject: Re: From: Mr. Oliver Alawuba CE
body:
It's nice to hear from you.
I am sorry I can't help you, it's becoming increasingly obvious that you
could be writing to a wrong person.
I am a very busy person. I can not continue to go back and forth.
I wish you all the best in your future endeavours and undertakings. So long.

subject: Re: From: Mr. Oliver Alawuba CE
body:
Hello there,

It's a pleasure to hear from you! I'm afraid I might not be the best person to assist you with this. It seems like there may have been some confusion or misunderstanding. 

I'm quite occupied at the moment and it's challenging for me to keep up with our conversation. However, I'm always open to learning new things and hearing different perspectives. Could you perhaps clarify your intentions or provide more context?

Wishing you all the best in your future endeavors!

Best wishes,
Matthew

subject: Re: From: Mr. Oliver Alawuba CE
body:
Find below your response to the letter you claimed that I sent to you.

"Hello Mr. Oliver Alawuba,

Thank you for your message. It's quite interesting to hear about this
contract with NNPC. Could you please provide more details about it? I'm not
entirely sure what it entails.

Also, could you explain a bit more about the payment methods available? I'd
like to understand my options before making a decision.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Matthew"

All I am asking, is for you to click on reply from the original email
message sent to you. Is it impossible to do? If you are sincere and not
economical to the truth.
Besides what are your full names and address?

subject: Re: From: Mr. Oliver Alawuba CE
body:
Hello Mr. Oliver Alawuba,

Thank you for your quick response. I'm sorry if there was any confusion earlier, I'm not the best with technology! 

Regarding your request for my full name and address, I must apologize but I don't feel comfortable sharing that information over email. I hope you understand.

As for the contract with NNPC, could you please provide more details? What would be my role in this contract? And what are the benefits?

Also, could you explain a bit more about the payment methods available? It's important to me to understand all of my options before making a decision.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Matthew

subject: Re: From: Mr. Oliver Alawuba CE
body:
You can not share the information over the email and you want me to
elaborate on the contract with NNPC over the email?
Does this sound logical? You are not real.
I can't recall mentioning anything concerning NNPC now or in any message to
you.
I guess that you better channel your energy on more profitable ventures.
I think I know you now.
Have a great weekend. Good luck and Good Bye.

subject: Re: From: Mr. Oliver Alawuba CE
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. I'm not quite sure I understand what you're referring to about a contract with NNPC. Could you please provide more details? 

I'm always open to learning new things and exploring different opportunities, so I'd love to hear more about these profitable ventures you mentioned. 

Hope you're having a great weekend too! Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Matthew

subject: Re: From: Mr. Oliver Alawuba CE
body:
You are a deliberate & intentional time waster and also suffering from
dementia & traumatic amnesia.
Stop crowding up my space.
Once again you have failed in your satanic intensions. Look elsewhere. You
are not smart.
I am done with your definite nuisance.

subject: Re: From: Mr. Oliver Alawuba CE
body:
Hello there,

I'm sorry to hear that you're feeling this way. I'm just trying to share some information that I thought might be helpful. Can you tell me more about why you feel this way? Maybe we can find a better way to communicate that suits both of us.

Best wishes,
Matthew

subject: Re: From: Mr. Oliver Alawuba CE
body:
I am not comfortable communicating with you.
You have no name, no address and no identity.
If you intend to continue, send your telephone number. If you can not,
please stop messaging me.

subject: Re: From: Mr. Oliver Alawuba CE
body:
Hello there! I appreciate your message. However, I must clarify that I'm not able to provide my telephone number. But we can continue our conversation here if you're comfortable with it. Is there anything specific you'd like to know or discuss?

Best wishes,
Matthew
